snippet: The military is fueling divisions in the country by using violence against the Muslim Brotherhood.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Egyptian military, claiming its violent crackdown on supporters of ousted Pres Mohamed Morsi has only fueled divisions within country; calls on United States to make better use of leverage to encourage peaceful compromise so factions can draft constitution that reflects democratic norms.
lead_paragraph: The military is fueling divisions in the country by using violence against the Muslim Brotherhood.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
